metadata.synopsis: This AD will be shown if players try to go away from the house after Araj give them the special explosive potion. This is the first warning. After that warning, if players still try to go away a full dialog will be activated. So no ultimations will be necesary in this one, I think.
metadata.how_to_trigger: After receive the potion, try to go away from S_Debug_Teleport_LOW_BloodMerchantsHouse_d03dde24-13d3-4fdd-a485-38b9a424f6c3

0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
0.text: Excuse me - where do you think you're going? You'll need to take the potion here, please!
0.context: NodeContext: Trying to be friendly but she's willing to kill the player if they don't comply.
